item.title: 在中国中植，影子银行倒闭前的风险做法
item.description: 据路透社和八位直接知情人士查阅的记录显示，去年宣布破产的中植企业集团曾是中国影子银行业的领头羊，在濒临倒闭之际，该集团采用了激进且可能非法的销售手段来维持运营。【原文：Zhongzhi Enterprise Group, a former leader of China's shadow banking sector that declared insolvency last year, used aggressive and potentially illegal sales practices to sustain its operations as it lurched toward collapse, according to records reviewed by Reuters and eight people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 油价因担心热带风暴导致供应中断而反弹
item.description: 由于对热带风暴弗朗辛干扰石油供应的担忧超过了对需求的担忧，周三原油价格反弹。【原文：Crude prices bounced on Wednesday as concerns about Tropical Storm Francine disrupting supply of oil outweighed worries about demand.】

item.title: 美国总统大选辩论前亚洲股市震荡；油价创三年新低
item.description: 周三，投资者为美国通胀数据和翘首以盼的美国总统辩论做准备，亚洲股市随之震荡，而油价则因对需求前景疲软的担忧在三年低点附近徘徊。【原文：Asian stocks wobbled on Wednesday as investors gear up for U.S. inflation data and an eagerly awaited U.S. presidential debate, while oil prices loitered around three-year lows on concerns over a weak demand outlook.】

item.title: 焦点转向美国总统辩论和通胀，日元逼近五周高点
item.description: 周三，日元兑欧元在五周高点附近徘徊，美元兑欧元接近三周高点，交易员们紧张地等待着一份关键的通胀报告，这份报告可能为下周美国将如何积极地削减利率提供线索。【原文：The yen hovered near a five-week peak and the dollar hung close to a three-week top versus the euro on Wednesday, as traders waited nervously for a key inflation report that could provide clues on how aggressively U.S. rates would be cut next week.】

item.title: 游说团体警告：欧洲企业怀疑中国是否有可信的经济转型计划
item.description: 一个欧洲商业游说团体周三表示，在华欧洲企业怀疑中国政府是否有可信的计划来提振萎靡不振的经济需求，或者是否会实施长期承诺的改革，这削弱了他们在中国投资的意愿。【原文：European firms in China doubt the government has a credible plan to boost demand in the ailing economy or will carry out long-promised reforms, diminishing their appetite to invest in the country, a European business lobby group said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 波音称与工会就劳资协议进行了真诚谈判
item.description: 波音公司首席运营官周二在路透社看到的一封致员工的信中说，波音公司与最大的工会之一就新的劳动合同进行了真诚的谈判，"并没有为了第二次投票而有所保留"。【原文：Boeing bargained in good faith with one of its biggest unions for the new labor contract and "did not hold back with an eye on a second vote", its chief operating officer said on Tuesday in a letter to employees seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 央行称澳大利亚紧张的劳动力市场将有所缓解
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周三表示，劳动力市场仍然紧张，但正趋于平衡，因为高利率会减缓需求，这应该是一个温和的衰退期。【原文：Australia's central bank said on Wednesday that the labour market remained tight but was moving towards balance as high interest rates work to slow demand in what should be a mild downturn.】

item.title: 索尼宣布推出价格更高的升级版 PlayStation 5 Pro
item.description: 索尼宣布，其旗舰游戏机 PlayStation 5 Pro 的升级版将于 11 月 7 日上市，售价 699.99 美元。【原文：Sony announced the PlayStation 5 Pro, an upgraded version of its flagship console offering better graphics, will go on sale on Nov. 7 priced at $699.99.】

item.title: 英国房地产门户网站 Rightmove 拒绝默多克旗下 REA 集团 73 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: 新闻集团支持的房地产上市公司 REA Group 周三表示，英国最大的房地产门户网站 Rightmove 拒绝了其 56 亿英镑（73.2 亿美元）的收购提议。【原文：News Corp-backed property listing company REA Group said on Wednesday that Britain's largest property portal Rightmove rejected its 5.6 billion pounds ($7.32 billion) buyout proposal.】

item.title: 受中国需求疲软影响，日本 9 月商业景气指数创 7 个月新低
item.description: 路透社周三进行的一项月度民意调查显示，日本大型制造商的商业信心在 9 月份降至七个月来的最低点，各行各业的经理人都认为中国需求疲软是一个令人担忧的问题。【原文：Business confidence at big Japanese manufacturers sank to a seven-month low in September, with managers across a wide range of sectors citing soft Chinese demand as a concern, a Reuters monthly poll showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 韩国 8 月失业率降至历史新低
item.description: 韩国官方数据周三显示，经季节性调整后，韩国 8 月份失业率从 7 月份的 2.5%降至 2.4%，创历史新低。【原文：South Korea's unemployment rate fell in August to a record low of 2.4% on a seasonally adjusted basis, from 2.5% in July, official data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊将向英国数据中心投资 100 亿美元
item.description: 互联网巨头亚马逊的云计算部门亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）周三表示，该公司计划在未来五年内斥资 80 亿英镑（104.5 亿美元）在英国建设、运营和维护数据中心。【原文：Internet giant Amazon's cloud computing arm, Amazon Web Services, said on Wednesday that it plans to spend 8 billion pounds ($10.45 billion) in the United Kingdom over the next five years to build, operate and maintain data centres.】

item.title: 联邦快递警告称，受风暴 "弗朗辛 "影响，路易斯安那州部分市场将出现延误
item.description: 联邦快递（FedEx）周二表示，路易斯安那州部分市场的取件和送件服务可能会因弗朗辛风暴的预期动荡而中断。【原文：FedEx said on Tuesday pickup and delivery services in some markets of Louisiana could be disrupted by the expected upheaval from Storm Francine, which is set to become the fourth hurricane of the Atlantic season.】

item.title: 在代理规则之争中，上诉法院裁定美国证券交易委员会胜诉
item.description: 周二，联邦上诉法院在一项分歧判决中做出了有利于华尔街最高监管机构的裁决，认定该机构有权废除特朗普时代有关代理顾问的部分法规。【原文：In a split decision, a federal appeals court on Tuesday ruled in favor of Wall Street's top regulator, finding the agency was within its rights to rescind parts of Trump-era regulations on proxy advisers.】

item.title: 研究显示：2023 年科技公司商务旅行将减半，但 Alphabet 和苹果公司落在后面
item.description: 总部位于布鲁塞尔的一个非政府组织在一份报告中说，与2019年相比，全球科技巨头2023年的公务航班排放量减少了一半，但苹果和谷歌母公司Alphabet等公司正在落后，有可能回到大流行前的水平。【原文：Global tech giants halved their business flight emissions in 2023 compared to 2019, but companies like Apple and Google's parent Alphabet are falling behind, risking a return to pre-pandemic levels, a Brussels-based NGO said in a report.】

item.title: 法官裁定，被定罪的尼古拉创始人米尔顿欠电动卡车制造商 1.68 亿美元
item.description: 一名美国法官称，尼古拉创始人特雷弗-米尔顿（Trevor Milton）在被判犯有欺诈罪后被判处四年监禁，他必须向这家电动卡车制造商支付 1.677 亿美元，因为他向公众作出了关于公司的虚假和误导性陈述。【原文：A U.S. judge said Trevor Milton, the Nikola founder who was sentenced to four years in prison after being convicted of fraud, must pay the electric truck maker $167.7 million for making false and misleading statements about the company to the public.】

item.title: 花旗集团首席会计官约翰布尔-奥克帕拉离职
item.description: 花旗集团首席会计官兼财务总监约翰布尔-奥克帕拉（Johnbull Okpara）在一份文件中说，他将辞职另谋高就，并于周二生效。【原文：Citigroup's chief accounting officer and controller Johnbull Okpara resigned to pursue another opportunity, effective Tuesday, the bank said in a filing.】

item.title: 早间竞标：通货紧缩态势加深
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 据 Axios 报道，科技公司高管将在美国参议院就选举威胁作证
item.description: 据Axios周二援引消息人士的话报道，谷歌、Adobe、微软和Meta Platforms等大型科技公司的高管将于下周在美国参议院情报委员会就选举威胁举行的听证会上作证。【原文：Executives from major tech firms like Google , Adobe , Microsoft and Meta Platforms will testify next week at a U.S. Senate Intelligence Committee hearing on election threats, Axios reported on Tuesday, citing sources.】

item.title: 高管作证：Tapestry-Capri 合并案为 Kors 提价提供了空间
item.description: 在监管机构试图阻止这项价值 85 亿美元的交易之际，Tapestry 的一位高层管理人员周二作证说，如果两家公司合并，时装控股公司 Tapestry 有空间提高竞争对手 Capri 旗下 Michael Kors 品牌的价格并降低折扣。【原文：Fashion holding company Tapestry has room to raise prices and lower discounts on rival Capri's Michael Kors brand if the companies merged, a top Tapestry executive testified on Tuesday as regulators sought to block the $8.5 billion deal.】

item.title: 消息人士称，高盛接近达成将通用汽车信用卡业务转让给巴克莱银行的协议
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周二透露，高盛集团即将敲定将通用汽车信用卡业务转让给巴克莱银行的交易。【原文：Goldman Sachs is close to finalizing a deal to transfer its General Motors credit card business to Barclays , a source familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴尔的摩在预定的阿片类药物审判前与 Teva 和 Walgreens 达成和解
item.description: 巴尔的摩市周二表示，该市已与沃尔格林公司就该药店经营者助长马里兰州该市阿片类药物成瘾的指控达成和解，这是在定于下周开始的审判之前达成的一系列和解中的最新一项，和解金额总计 4.025 亿美元。【原文：Baltimore said on Tuesday that it has settled with Walgreens over claims that the pharmacy operator fueled opioid addiction in the Maryland city, the latest in a series of settlements totaling $402.5 million ahead of a trial scheduled to begin next week.】

item.title: 视频游戏零售商 GameStop 季度收入不及预期
item.description: 视频游戏零售商 GameStop 周二公布的季度营收不及华尔街预期，原因是消费者从传统的实体店转向了网上购物。【原文：Videogame retailer GameStop missed Wall Street expectations for quarterly revenue on Tuesday, as consumers moved away from traditional brick-and-mortar stores to online purchasing.】

item.title: DirecTV 拒绝迪斯尼恢复 ABC 总统辩论的提议
item.description: DirecTV 拒绝了沃尔特-迪斯尼公司（Walt Disney Co）提出的恢复美国广播公司（ABC）网络的提议，用户无法观看美国广播公司新闻频道（ABC News）主持的周二美国总统辩论。【原文：DirecTV has rejected Walt Disney Co's offer to restore the ABC network to subscribers to watch Tuesday's U.S. presidential debate, which ABC News is hosting.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，REA 集团向英国房地产巨头 Rightmove 提出初步收购要约
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）旗下的房地产列表公司 REA Group 已向英国 Rightmove 提出初步收购要约。【原文：Rupert Murdoch-owned property listings firm REA Group has made an initial takeover offer for Britain's Rightmove , Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃克森首席执行官伍兹对未来股东活动家的忠告：遵守规则
item.description: 埃克森公司（Exxon）首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）周二对那些想效仿美国最大石油公司提出气候相关股东提案的激进股东提出了警告。【原文：Exxon CEO Darren Woods on Tuesday had warning words for activist shareholders thinking to emulate those who filed a climate-related shareholder proposal at the largest U.S. oil company.】

item.title: 报告估计，到 2029 年，减肥市场将出现 16 种新药
item.description: 根据晨星（Morningstar）和 Pitchbook 分析师的估计，减肥治疗市场预计将有 16 种新药争夺目前由诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）和礼来（Eli Lilly）主导的利润丰厚的业务。【原文：The market for weight-loss treatments is expected to see 16 new drugs vying for a slice of the lucrative business currently dominated by Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly , according to estimates from analysts at Morningstar and Pitchbook.】

item.title: 新闻集团前高管作证：放弃谷歌广告将损失 900 万美元
item.description: 一位前高管周二在弗吉尼亚州举行的谷歌反垄断审判中作证说，新闻集团曾在 2017 年探讨过放弃谷歌的广告工具，但估计这样做会让《华尔街日报》出版商损失至少 900 万美元的广告收入。【原文：News Corp explored switching away from Google's advertising tools in 2017 but estimated that doing so would lose the Wall Street Journal publisher at least $9 million in ad revenue, a former executive testified on Tuesday at Google's antitrust trial in Virginia.】

item.title: 美国银行首席执行官称巴菲特一直是伟大的支持者，但并未过问股票出售事宜
item.description: 美国银行首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）周二表示，沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）一直是该公司的优秀投资者，但他并未向这位传奇投资者询问最近减持该银行股份的举动。【原文：Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan said on Tuesday Warren Buffett has been a great investor in the company, but he has not asked the legendary investor about recent moves to reduce his stake in the lender.】

item.title: 聚焦：十年过去了，博廷对其家族建立的桑坦德银行帝国的重新设计仍未完成
item.description: 西班牙银行家安娜-博廷（Ana Botin）在父亲突然去世后，立即着手将桑坦德银行（Santander）改造成一家更精简、更简单的全球性银行。【原文：Spanish banker Ana Botin set about transforming Santander , a sprawling, acquisition-obsessed and fragmented lender into a leaner, simpler global bank as soon as her father's sudden death thrust her into the role.】
